modName: Children of the Night - Vampire Overhaul
summary: Adds a new type of vampire, \"Children of the Night\" have a plethora of new abilities with a blood based hunger system, but also a variety of challenges they will learn to overcome.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=200%][u]~Children of the Night~[/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=200%][u]Vampire Overhaul[/u][/size][/center]

[u]Summary:[/u]
Adds a new type of vampire, \"Children of the Night\" have a plethora of new abilities with a blood based hunger system, but also a variety of challenges they will learn to overcome.

[center]-&-[/center]

[u]Changes:[/u]
-Adds a new type of vampire, \"Children of the Night\" which the player can become by seeking out the Nighmare\'s shrine.
-Adds a dynamic alternate advancement system, wherein one can improve and unlock abilities in the four categories: Shadow, Transformation, Hypnosis and Blood magic.
-Blood based hunger system, blood level is actively tracked with time-safe method that makes blood far more interesting.
-Numerous challenges to those afflicted with vampirism, such as blood rage and near-blindness in day.
-Modular transformation system allows the player to make their body the plaything of their mind.
-Ability based system allows NPCs to become Children of the Night, alongside the player.
-Fully functioning blood bottling system, store blood for later, but watch out for it spoiling, or draining too much and killing the donor.
-Anemia system, blood in NPCs is in independent of health, meaning one can drain cattle to it\'s death, without doing a single point of damage.  

[u]Challenges[/u]
-Persistant NPC blood levels; no more infinite cattle.
-Sharpened night vision leaves player blind in day.
-Blood based fatigue system; you run on blood now, not air.

[u]Spells - Shadow[/u]
[b]Shadow Step:[/b] Teleports the caster to another, as long as both are in show. Depletes a small ammount of blood based on distance.
[b]Shadow Steal:[/b] Teleports another to the caster, as long as both are in shadow. Depletes a small ammount of blood based on distance.

[u]Spells - Transformation[/u]
[b]Mist Bolt:[/b] Transforms the caster into mist, then launches them in the direction of casting, to reform on collision. It has a medium initial blood cost, but requires none to sustain and can be used to travel vast distances quickly and cheaply.
[b]Mist Form:[/b] Transforms the caster into a cloud of blood and shadow, allowing them flight and increased speed, at the cost of a medium amount of blood to transform, and a small amount to maintain.
[b]Sharpen Senses:[/b] Toggle-able ability that allows detect life on all moving actors, useful for making do with day blindness.

[u]Spells - Passive[/u]
[b]Bottle Blood:[/b] Painlessly bottle blood from a donor, with adjustable amounts based on selection (a little, a lot, all) and the donor\'s max health.
[b]Introspection:[/b] Meditate on what you have learnt, config, debug and perk selection all in one meditative bundle.

[center]-&-[/center]
